description:
Are you passionate about sports and detail-oriented? Join our team as a Remote Data Entry Clerk and play a key role in ensuring accurate and insightful sports data for our digital and broadcast platforms. This position offers both part-time and full-time opportunities.

Key Responsibilities

Data Accuracy: Ensure that sports information, including scores, schedules, standings, and statistics, is precise, up-to-date, and insightful.

Real-Time Updates: Work individually and collaboratively to provide accurate game breakdowns, live scores, and various metrics that fuel our sports products and productions.

Content Creation: Help transform raw data into engaging storylines by identifying significant statistical events that explain game outcomes.

Quality Control: Review your work and that of others to maintain high standards of detail and accuracy.

Collaboration: Contribute to team and departmental efforts, assist with production tasks, and support both full-time and part-time staff.

Problem Solving: Anticipate potential issues, develop solutions, and communicate effectively with team members to address challenges.

Feedback and Improvement: Actively seek and respond to feedback to enhance personal and team performance.

Required Skills And Qualifications

Sports Knowledge: Strong understanding of teams, players, and game rules.

Availability: Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed.

Learning Agility: Ability to quickly grasp production processes that manage sports data.

Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy in time-sensitive data entry tasks.

Communication: Confidently communicate, both verbally and in writing, with production managers and team members.

Preferred Skills And Qualifications

Experience: At least 1 year working with sports data or statistics, preferably in a media environment.

Familiarity: Knowledge of how sports data is utilized in media and research.

Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and other Office applications.

Leadership: Experience in leading or training a team.

Languages: Ability to speak and write in Spanish.

Social Media: Experience with social media in a business or news context.

Education

Degree: Relevant higher education or equivalent experience.

Additional Information

Shifts: Includes late shifts, weekends, and holidays.

If you're ready to combine your love for sports with your attention to detail and join a dynamic team, we'd love to hear from you!

Employment Type: Full-Time
